get.summary: Returns the current status of the service
get.description: Returns the current status of the service.

post.summary: Load a USD file into the stage

get.summary: Lists the existing A2F instances in the scene
get.description: Returns the existing instances as dictionary {'fullface_instances':[paths]}

post.summary: Sets the current frame
post.description: Set the current frame. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to set a time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Returns the current frame
post.description: Returns the current frame. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to get a time stamp (seconds) instead

post.summary: Sets the values for the specified settings in the given A2F instance
post.description: The settings to update must be specified as a dictionary of {setting:value} pairs

post.summary: Get the specified setting values in the given A2F instance
post.description: The settings to retrieve must be specified as a dictionary of {setting:value} pairs

post.summary: Get the list of available settings in the given A2F instance
post.description: Returns a list of setting names

post.summary: List the emotion weights at a given frame. If a frame is not specified the emotions at current frame are returned
post.description: returns a list or a dictionary {"emotion":weight}

post.summary: Set the current frame emotion weights for the given A2F instance
post.description: The emotion vector should be a list of floats. To specify emotions by name instead, use the A2F/A2E/SetEmotionByName

post.summary: Sets the weights for the specified emotions in the given A2F instance
post.description: Please provide a dictionary {"emotion":weight} with the emotion names and values to override. Alternatively you can use A2F/A2E/SetEmotion to set all emotions at once with a vector.

post.summary: The number of A2E keyframes
post.description: List the existing number of emotion keys

post.summary: List the exisiting emotion key frames
post.description: Returns a list of existing key frames. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to get time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Lists the existing emotion keys and values
post.description: Returns the key frames and values. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to get time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Removes the specified A2E key frames
post.description: Removes the specified key frames. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to specify time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Set emotion keys
post.description: Sets key frames and values. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to specify time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: A2E streaming mode
post.description: Enable or disable auto-emotion in streaming and microphone modes

post.summary: Auto Generate On Track Change
post.description: Enable or disable the automatic generation of A2E keys on track change.

post.summary: Get the automatic emotion keyframe generation settings
post.description: Please see GenerateEmotionKeysRequest schema description for the available settings

post.summary: Sets the parameters for the automatic emotion keyframe generation
post.description: Please see GenerateEmotionKeysRequest schema for the available parameters

post.summary: Generate emotion keys automatically
post.description: Generates emotion key frames automatically. You can specify the settings to generate the emotion keys. If not specified, the scene values are used instead. Specifying the settings in this function does not ovverride the existing scene values on the scene. !!This function OVERRIDES any exisiting keys!!

post.summary: Sets the Pre-processing settings in the given A2F instance
post.description: Please see the A2FPreProcessingSettingsRequest description for the available settings

post.summary: Gets the current Pre-processing parameters
post.description: Returns the Pre-processing parameters as a dictionary {setting:name} pairs

post.summary: The number of post-processing keyframes
post.description: Returns the number of key frames on the post-processing settings

post.summary: List the existing post-processing key frames
post.description: Returns a list of existing key frames. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to get time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Lists the existing post-processing keys and values
post.description: Returns the key frames and values. use the option 'as_timestamps' to get time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Removes the specified post-processing key frames
post.description: Removes the specified the key frames. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to specify time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Set post-processing key frames
post.description: Set the key frames and values. Use the option 'as_timestamps' to specify time stamps (s) instead

post.summary: Sets post-processing settings in A2F for the current frame
post.description: Please use the /POST/GetSettingNames to get a list the available settings

post.summary: Get the post-processing setting values
post.description: Get the current post-processing parameters. Specify a frame or time stamp to get the parameters at that time

post.summary: List the available post-processing settings
post.description: Returns a list of setting names

get.summary: Lists the existing player instances in the scene
get.description: Returns the existing instances as dictionary {'regular':[paths],'streaming':[paths] }

post.summary: List the audio root path on the given player
post.description: Returns the directory path

post.summary: Sets the root folder for the audio files.
post.description: Expects a path to a folder.

post.summary: List available audio tracks on the given player
post.description: Returns list of available audio files on the specified player

post.summary: List the current audio track on the given player
post.description: Returns the name of the current audio file on the specified Player

post.summary: Set a track as the active audio track
post.description: Expects an audio filename within the root track folder

post.summary: Lists the default and working time ranges of the active audio track
post.description: Returns a dictionary {'default':[float,float], 'work':[float,float]}. The range is specified by start and end time stamps in seconds.

post.summary: Sets the working time range for the active audio track
post.description: Expects start/end time stamps in seconds. The start/end parameters are optional. The default range values are used for the missing parameter. Clamps range if necessary.

post.summary: Gets the current time stamp of the active audio track
post.description: Returns a time in seconds.

post.summary: Sets the current time stamp of the active audio track
post.description: Expects a time in seconds.

post.summary: Starts playing the current track.
post.description: Starts playing the current track.

post.summary: Pauses the player.
post.description: Pauses the player.

post.summary: Rewind the player.
post.description: Sets the current time back to the first frame.

post.summary: Enables/Disables looping audio tracks.
post.description: (Bool) Enables/Disables looping audio tracks..

get.summary: Lists the existing blendshape solver nodes in the scene
get.description: Returns a lists of paths to the blendshape solves

get.summary: Lists the existing StreamLivelink nodes in the scene
get.description: Returns a lists of paths to the StreamLivelink nodes

post.summary: Activate a StreamLivelink node
post.description: Activate a StreamLivelink node. The node will try connecting to host:port.

post.summary: Get if the node is connected
post.description: Get if a StreamLivelink node is active and connected.

post.summary: Get the setting values of the StreamLivelink node
post.description: The settings specified as a dictionary of {setting:value} pairs

post.summary: Set the setting values of the StreamLivelink node
post.description: The settings should be specified as a dictionary of {setting:value} pairs

post.summary: Export the blendshape weights
post.description: Batch or single audio track export function. Please check the ExportRequestModel description for the export options. Existing output files will be overwritten.

post.summary: Export geometry caches
post.description: Batch or single audio track export function. Please check the ExportGeometryCacheRequestModel description for the export options. Existing output files will be overwritten.

post.summary: Export emotion keys
post.description: Batch or single audio track export function for emotion keys. Please check the ExportEmotionKeysRequestModel description for the export options. Existing output files will be overwritten.

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

node_path.title: A target node path
node_path.description: Path to a node to access.

value.title: Activate
value.description: True to enable, False to disable.

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

keys.title: key frames
keys.description: Frame numbers or time stamps to add

values.title: key values
values.description: A list of emotion weight vectors for each key frame

as_timestamps.title: as time stamps
as_timestamps.description: The key data is specified as time stamps (s) instead of frame numbers

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

keys.title: key frames
keys.description: Frame numbers or time stamps to add

values.title: key values
values.description: A list of settings dictionary for each key frame

as_timestamps.title: as time stamps
as_timestamps.description: the key data is specified as time stamps (s) instead of frames

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

enable.title: Auto Generate On Track Change
enable.description: Enable/Disable generation of keyframes upon track change

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

enable.title: Enable Auto-Emotion Streaming
enable.description: Enable/Disable auto-emotion in streaming and microphone modes

a2f_node.title: A2F node to export the emotion keys
a2f_node.description: Path to the A2F node to export. Use /A2F/GetInstances to list the available nodes

export_directory.title: directory for export
export_directory.description: Destination folder to export the data. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

file_name.title: file name
file_name.description: Output file name/ prefix. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

batch.title: batch processing
batch.description: If enabled, exports the animation for all files in root folder. When using batch the file name is used as a prefix before the audio file name.

meshes.title: meshes
meshes.description: a list of meshes to export. if not set it will export the visible meshes in the stage.

export_directory.title: directory for export
export_directory.description: Destination folder to export the data. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

file_name.title: file name
file_name.description: Output file name/ prefix. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

cache_type.title: type of cache to export
cache_type.description: The type of cache to be exported ( usd, maya )

xform_keys.title: Export rigid xforms as keys
xform_keys.description: (Only USD) Export rigid xforms as keys or baked as geometry.

batch.title: batch processing
batch.description: (Only USD) Export single audio file or all files in root folder. When using batch the file name is used as a prefix before the audio file name.

fps.title: frame rate
fps.description: Frame rate of the keys. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

solver_node.title: blendshape solver node to export
solver_node.description: Path to the solver node to export. Use /A2F/Exporter/GetBlendShapeSolvers to list the available nodes

export_directory.title: directory for export
export_directory.description: Destination folder to export the data. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

file_name.title: file name
file_name.description: Output file name/ prefix. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

batch.title: batch processing
batch.description: If enabled, exports the animation for all files in root folder. When using batch the file name is used as a prefix before the audio file name.

fps.title: frame rate
fps.description: Frame rate of the keys. Will use the scene setting value if unspecified.

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

a2e_window_size.title: emotion detection range
a2e_window_size.description: Sets the size of the audio chunk used to predict a single emotion/keyframe (in seconds)

a2e_stride.title: keyframe interval
a2e_stride.description: Sets the stride (step) between adjacent audio windows/keyframes (in seconds)

a2e_emotion_strength.title: emotion strength
a2e_emotion_strength.description: Sets the strength of the generated emotions relative to neutral emotion

a2e_smoothing_kernel_radius.title: smoothing conv
a2e_smoothing_kernel_radius.description: Sets the number of neighboring keyframes used for emotion smoothing

a2e_smoothing_exp.title: smoothing exp
a2e_smoothing_exp.description: Sets a coefficient indicating how much the previous emotion value affects the next one

a2e_max_emotions.title: max emotions
a2e_max_emotions.description: Sets a firm limit on the quantity of emotion sliders engaged by A2E - emotions with highest weight will be prioritized

a2e_contrast.title: emotion contrast
a2e_contrast.description: Increases the spread between emotion values by pushing them higher or lower

preferred_emotion.title: preferred emotion
preferred_emotion.description: Use the specified emotion vector as preferent emotion. Use false to unset

a2e_preferred_emotion_strength.title: preferred emotion strength
a2e_preferred_emotion_strength.description: Sets the strength of the preferred emotion (if loaded) relative to the generated emotions

a2e_streaming_smoothing.title: streaming smoothing
a2e_streaming_smoothing.description: Streaming mode: coefficient for exponential smoothing of emotion

a2e_streaming_update_period.title: streaming update period
a2e_streaming_update_period.description: Streaming mode: Perform emotion update every N ticks

a2e_streaming_transition_time.title: streaming transition time
a2e_streaming_transition_time.description: Streaming mode: Transition time between emotions change

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

as_vector.title: as vector
as_vector.description: Returns a vector containing the emotion weights instead of a dictionary {"emotion":weight}

frame.title: Frame
frame.description: Return the emotion weights at the given frame

as_timestamp.title: as time stamps
as_timestamp.description: The given frame is specified as a time stamp(s)

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

as_timestamp.title: as time stamp
as_timestamp.description: return the current frame as a time stamp (s) instead of a frame number

a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

as_timestamps.title: as time stamps
as_timestamps.description: Return the key data as time stamps (s) instead of frame numbers

a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

frame.description: The frame to evaluate the settings

as_timestamp.description: The given frame was specified as a time stamp (s) instead of a frame number

as_timestamps.title: as time stamps
as_timestamps.description: The given frames are specified as time stamps (s) instead of frame numbers

dir_path.title: Track root path
dir_path.description: Path to the audio source folder

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

emotions.title: emotion values
emotions.description: a dictionary {"emotion":weight} with the emotion names and values to override.

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

emotion.title: emotion vector
emotion.description: A vector containing the emotion weights to set

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

frame.title: Frame
frame.description: frame number or time stamp in seconds

as_timestamp.title: as time stamp
as_timestamp.description: The given frame is specified as a time stamps (s) instead of a frame number

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

settings.title: settings
settings.description: A dictonary of settings in the form {setting:value}

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

prediction_delay.title: prediction delay
prediction_delay.description: Allows to adjust the synchronization between audio and motion. Delay in seconds.

input_strength.title: input strength
input_strength.description: Controls the magnitude of the input audio. Amplitude multiplier in the range [0.0,3.0]

blink_interval.title: blink interval
blink_interval.description: Controls the frequency of blinks. Frequency in seconds

eye_saccade_seed.title: eye saccade data
eye_saccade_seed.description: Controls which eye dart motion is applied

start.title: start
start.description: (float) Start time in seconds. Original file range used if unspecified or <0.

end.title: end
end.description: (float) End time in seconds. Original file range used if unspecified or <0.

a2f_instance.title: A2F Core instance
a2f_instance.description: Path to the A2F core instance prim

settings.title: settings
settings.description: A dictonary of the different settings in the form {setting:value}

node_path.title: A target node path
node_path.description: Path to a node to access.

values.title: Settings
values.description: The settings to be set, specified as a dictionary of {setting:value} pairs.

time.title: time
time.description: (float) Set the current time for the player

time_range.title: time range
time_range.description: [Optional] The work time range for the audio file in seconds. Default time range used if not specified.
